name: Prisoner (itch)
description:
This is my first game. I'm a novice game designer.

The game is an action rpg, based on some of my favourite games. It's a very short one (20-25 min). Mostly it's an attempt to actually finish a game and figure out an action rpg engine.

Follow me on twitter: @Lahiter

My blog: http://lahitergames.com/
